呂秀蓮宣布退選 批評總統連署規定違憲【聲明全文】
02 Nov 2019, 18:20 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社台北2日電）尋求總統選舉連署的前副總統呂秀蓮今天宣布退選，強調由於法律及政治因素未能完成連署，深致歉意卻也體認人性善與惡，感謝所有支持者，並將繼續與愛好和平公義人士同心協力，為共創美好台灣努力。
呂秀蓮、前南投縣長彭百顯接受喜樂島聯盟推薦投入2020正副總統選舉連署，從9月19日起展開連署活動，須獲得28萬384人連署，才可取得角逐2020總統大選的資格，在收件截止今天下午5時30分前一刻，透過新聞稿宣布退選。
呂秀蓮、彭百顯辦公室提出5點批評，包括總統副總統選舉罷免法強制連署人需附身分證影本規定，侵害公民隱私權，嚴重阻礙連署進行，根本違憲。
此外，中央選舉委員會不許被連署人在連署書上註記「回收地址」，造成國內外各地連署人不知如何回寄連署書的困擾，應負刁難之責。
新聞稿並指出，國內主流媒體及政論節目明顯「政媒掛鉤」，淪為特定候選人的競選工具，並全面無情封殺呂彭相關新聞，形同「媒體集體謀殺 」，當權者高喊民主，卻公然摧殘民主，而媒體自甘墮落，應受國人公譴。
兩人也再度指控，全國各地連署站確實遭受各種形式的恐嚇、辱罵及干擾，甚至收買，以致實際收到的連署書與預期可收的數量產生嚴重落差，內情並不單純，因此決定不提交連署書。
呂秀蓮、彭百顯辦公室表示，非公務機關對個人資料蒐集，應遵守個資法規定，凡已收取呂彭參選連署書而未繳回呂彭被連署人者，應承負法律責任。為此，特別呼籲各界人士提供有關連署不法情事以供查究。1081102
新聞稿全文如下：
一、總統副總統選舉罷免法強制連署人需附身分證影本之規定，侵害公民隱私權，嚴重阻礙連署之進行，根本違憲。（司法院大法官釋字603號）
二、中央選舉委員會不許被連署人在連署書上註記「回收地址」，造成國內外各地連署人不知如何回寄連署書的困擾，應負刁難之責。
三、國內主流媒體及政論節目明顯「政媒掛鉤」，淪為特定候選人的競選工具，並全面無情封殺呂彭相關新聞，形同「媒體集體謀殺 」，當權者高喊民主，卻公然摧殘民主，而媒體自甘墮落，應受國人公譴。
四、全國各地連署站確實遭受各種形式的恐嚇、辱罵及干擾，甚至收買，以致實際收到的連署書與預期可收的數量產生嚴重落差，內情並不單純，因此決定不提交連署書。
五、非公務機關對個人資料之蒐集，應遵守個資法規定，凡已收取呂彭參選連署書而未繳回呂彭被連署人者，應承負法律責任。為此，特別呼籲各界人士提供有關連署之不法情事以供查究。
呂秀蓮、彭百顯此次秉承喜樂島及人民最大黨等新進政黨之支持及各界愛台灣的民主人士情義相挺，由於法律及政治因素未能完成連署，深致歉意卻也體認人性之善與惡。對所有支持者，我們衷心感謝，願一本初衷，繼續與愛好和平公義人士同心協力，共創美好台灣努力，再努力！

Annette Lu announced her withdrawal from the election.
02 Nov 2019, 18:20 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency, Taipei, 2nd) -- Former Vice President Annette Lu, who is seeking a presidential election, announced her withdrawal today, stressing that due to legal and political factors, she failed to complete the connection, but she apologized but also recognized human nature and evil. Thanks to all supporters. Continue to work together with peace-loving and just-minded people to work hard to create a better Taiwan.
Annette Lu and former Nantou County magistrate Peng Baixian accepted the Joy Island Alliance's recommendation to join the 2020 Presidential and Vice Presidential Elections. Starting from September 19th, the company will be required to obtain 280,384 people to be eligible for the 2020 presidential election. The moment before 5:30 pm today, the press release announced the withdrawal.
Annette Lu and Peng Baixian’s office put forward five criticisms, including the presidential vice presidential election dismissal law, which forced the signatories to attach a copy of the card’s stipulations, infringing citizens’ privacy rights, seriously impeding the co-operation and was unconstitutional.
In addition, the Central Election Commission is not allowed to be linked to the "Recycling Address" on the Lian Dian, which has caused the troubles of all the people at home and abroad to know how to return the Lian Dian.
The press release also pointed out that the mainstream media and political programs in the country are obviously "linked by the political media" and become the candidate's campaign tool. They have completely ruthlessly blocked Lu Peng's related news, which is similar to "media collective murder". Those in power shouted democracy. However, it has blatantly devastated democracy, and the media has been degraded by the people.
The two also accused again that all the stations in the country were indeed subjected to various forms of intimidation, insults and interference, and even bought, resulting in a serious gap between the actual number of books received and the expected amount of income, and the situation was not simple, so they decided not to submit. Even the book.
Annette Lu and Peng Baixian’s office stated that non-public affairs agencies should abide by the provisions of the individual capital law for the collection of personal data. Anyone who has received the Lv Peng election and failed to pay back Lv Peng’s co-authored person should bear legal responsibility. To this end, we especially appeal to people from all walks of life to provide relevant information for investigation. 1081102
The full press release is as follows:
1. The presidential vice presidential election dismissal law enforces the requirement that the person in possession must bear the shadow of the card, infringe on the privacy rights of the citizens, and seriously hinder the conduct of the company, which is totally unconstitutional. (The Chief Justice of the Court, Interpretation No. 603)
2. The Central Election Commission is not allowed to be linked to the "Recycling Address" on the Lian Dian, which has caused the troubles of the people at home and abroad not to know how to return the Lian Dian.
Third, the domestic mainstream media and political programs are obviously "linked by political media", which is a campaign tool for specific candidates, and comprehensively and ruthlessly bans Lu Peng's related news, which is similar to "collective murder of the media". The authorities in power shouted democracy but blatantly devastated Democracy, while the media has been degraded, it should be squandered by the people of the country.
4. The stations in various parts of the country have indeed suffered various forms of intimidation, insults and interference, and even bought them. As a result, the actual number of books received and the expected amount of income have been seriously degraded. The internal situation is not simple. Therefore, it is decided not to submit the company.
5. The collection of personal data by non-public affairs agencies shall comply with the provisions of the individual capital law. Anyone who has received the Lv Peng election and has not paid the Lv Peng to be connected shall be liable. To this end, we especially appeal to people from all walks of life to provide relevant information about the illegal circumstances of the company.
Annette Lu and Peng Baixian are adhering to the support of new parties such as the island of Joy and the People's Party, and the democrats who love Taiwan are quite similar. Due to legal and political factors, they have not been able to complete the connection. They apologize but also recognize the good and evil of human nature. . We sincerely thank all the supporters. I hope that with the original intention, we will continue to work together with peace-loving and righteous people to create a beautiful Taiwanese effort and work harder!
